greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000120(n) + A001221(n) - 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537 (first 1000 terms from G. C. Greubel)
formula: G.f.: Sum a(n) x^n = Sum A000120(p)*x^p/(1-x^p), p = prime.
program: def a(n): return 0 if n<2 else bin(n)[2:].count("1") + len(primefactors(n)) - 1 # _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 25 2017
results.author: Daniele Parisse (daniele.parisse(AT)m.dasa.de)
